means: （使）变红，发怒，过热( inflame的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The shooting has only inflamed passions further.
sentence.Network_cn: 枪击事件无疑是火上浇油。

sentence.Network_en: Symptoms include red, itchy and inflamed skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 症状包括皮肤发红、发痒、发炎。

sentence.Network_en: His comments have inflamed teachers all over the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的评论激怒了全国教师。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... inflame 使燃烧；激怒(某人) inflamed 发炎的 inflammation 激怒；炽热；炎症.
eyes inflamed with crying ., 因为哭泣而红肿的眼睛.
acute sinusitis , the cavities around your nasal passages ( sinuses ) inflamed and swollen . this interferes with drainage and causes mucus to build up .患急性鼻窦炎时，鼻通道周围的腔道（鼻窦)发生炎症和肿胀，干扰了黏液排出，导致黏液积聚。
abdominal inflamed lump of severe acute pancreatitis ., 重症急性胰腺炎腹部炎性包块.

list.abs: infix 把…镶入inflamability limit 易燃限度inflame 使燃
指示灯 indicator lamp易燃材料 inflamable material锭 ingot
blackwood 红木bladder inflamation 膀胱炎bladder inflammation 膀胱炎
If the intestinal walls are chronically inflamed , lipolysis is disturbed., 如果肠壁慢性炎症 , 脂解作用被扰乱.

entry.def: If part of your body is inflamed, it is red or swollen, usually as a result of an infection, injury, or illness.

example.ex: Symptoms include red, itchy and inflamed skin...
example.tran: 症状包括皮肤发红、发痒、发炎。

example.ex: Her eyes were sore and inflamed.

means.word_mean: 1. resulting from inflammation; hot and swollen and reddened;
2. lighted with red light as if with flames;

auth_sentence.content: The gruesome horror stories that had inflamed public opinion.
auth_sentence.res_content: The gruesome horror stories that had inflamed public opinion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The gruesome horror stories that had inflamed public opinion.

auth_sentence.content: Peritonitis occurs when this membrane becomes inflamed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Peritonitis occurs when this membrane becomes inflamed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Peritonitis occurs when this membrane becomes inflamed.

auth_sentence.content: The family doctor discovered an inflamed membrane in her left ear.
auth_sentence.res_content: The family doctor discovered an inflamed membrane in her left ear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The family doctor discovered an inflamed membrane in her left ear.

sentences.en: He is suffering from an inflamed throat.
sentences.cn: 他正承受着咽喉发炎之苦。
